meanings.definition: An allusive or oblique remark or hint, typically a suggestive or disparaging one.
meanings.sent1: She made an innuendo about his intelligence, but he didn't catch it.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's innuendo made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent3: The innuendo about her cooking skills was so subtle, it took a moment to sink in.
meanings.sent4: His innuendo was like a hidden arrow, striking right at the heart of the matter.
meanings.sent5: The innuendo in her words painted a vivid picture of her true feelings.
